item.description: The president announced the planned change in U.S. policy during a speech at a Saudi investment forum at the start of the first major international tr...

item.title: Zelensky Asks Trump to Attend Peace Talks, but Putin’s Plans Remain Unclear

item.title: In Augustinian Order, Pope Leo XIV Found Unity, Charity and ‘Eternal Friendship’
item.description: The Order of St. Augustine, with fewer than 3,000 members, shaped the man who would become a cardinal, and then pope to the world’s Roman Catholics.

item.title: Kim Kardashian Testifies in Paris Court About 2016 Robbery Ordeal
item.description: The reality TV star, in emotional testimony at a trial in Paris, described being held at gunpoint as jewelry worth millions was stolen in 2016.

item.title: Tariffs Push Honda to Move Production From Canada to U.S.
item.description: President Trump’s trade war again tests Canada’s new government. Honda is also canceling plans for a major electric vehicle factory in Canada.
